value:
The Fire Emblem is the key to awaken
the blade that can bind dragons. My
late father told me this long ago.

My brother...he has changed. He has
awakened dragons, which will bring
freedom to the world, in his eyes...

Is it true that the larger a land gets,
the more it must crush the hearts
of its people? I hope not.

Do you have an errand? Were you
amenable, I would be pleased to
join you.

This castle is home to so many
Heroes who have brought wars
to an end...$k$pI would very much like to collect
their knowledge and use it to
architect a lasting peace.

It is often that I hear
$Nf mention
$Nu.

Let us move forward! For
the good of all in the land!

I have betrayed Bern, betrayed my
brother...and yet, I am still proud to
be of Bern.

Even if my name is cursed as a
traitorous princess... My convictions
will not waver.
Yes. I am prepared.

I am Guinivere. My elder brother is
Zephiel, the King of Bern. I must
stop him at all costs.

My brother is not a trivial man who
dreams of easily bringing the world
to heel...$k$pHe sees himself as a liberator. I have
heard him speak of it time and again,
seen the darkness in his sad eyes.$k$pNo matter the justification, there is no
cause to drag innocents into a war
and steal their lives. Surely you agree.$k$pHe was so kind to me when we were
young, but I know that those days
are gone. And so...I must stop him.$k$pWith your knowledge and bravery, I
believe that I can overcome any
challenge. Please remain with me.
はあっ
これで…
うっ…
なんてこと…！
Cease this foolishness!
Reap what you sow!
I have steeled my heart!
Forgive me!
Dear brother...
ふふ…
I am Guinivere. My elder brother is Zephiel, the King of Bern.
Oh! You gave me quite the fright. I used to play the same prank on Zephiel when I was a girl, you know.
I...I must stop my brother, before it is too late. I must.
Melady and Elen are the best retainers a princess could ask for. I have nothing but gratitude for them.
Lord Roy may be young, but he has a greatness about him that belies his years... I believe he will make things right.
I do fear that, if I am remembered by history, it will not be fondly but as a princess who betrayed her own kingdom.
When I'm with you, I somehow feel a rush of confidence...the very confidence required to face my fate with head held high.
Very well.
Are you certain?
We must end this.
